Current password New password Current email address.. New email address.. General FAQ. Warranty, defects and returns FAQ. Shipping FAQ How does this work Share Flash Sales Every night at 00:00 new products are featured on our app and website. The offers are valid for 24 hours, or while stocks last. After ordering the product on Flash Sales the product will be delivered. I missed a deal. Can I still get it? No. Once a deal expires or sells out the promotion is over. Period. We may offer it again at a later date. I have a question about the product What we do know can be found under "specifications" on the product page. If you need even more info, grab that model name and number and do some Google PI work. Do I get normal customer service? Nope.You get the best customer service this side of Indian call centres. If you have a question, comment, change of heart or faulty unit, fire off a mail to [email] and a friendly little boffin will write you back sharpish. Are my purchases under warranty? Yes, but mostly not by us. Almost every product is covered by the warranty provided by the manufacturer. But if your precious new toy breaks, it's easiest to get in touch with us and we'll have them contact you. My product does not work Please contact our customer support at [2mail] an we can begin the refund process. How can I return a product? Email our customer service department and those little beauties will be happy to talk you out of it. If that does not work. They will sort something out. If you really want to return the product be sure to do so within 5 days of receipt of the item at the delivery address. You will be requested to supply your order number, the name of the product you are returning, and the detailed problem with the item. We will respond with a return authorisation. Because we are not likely to have a replacement in stock. You should be prepared for a refund-only option. My order was damaged upon arrival. What can I do? Please contact customer support so we can start the refund policy How long will delivery take? How long is a piece of string? It all depends on the product. We generally aim to get you your stuff in 5 - 10 working days, but it can take longer.After ordering, processing and preparing your order we will send you a tracking number that you can use to see where your goodies are. Adding this product to favourites. Product exists in favourites. Prize infomration Shipping price PROCESSING AND SHIPPING

Orders will be processed within 3-7 business days! Shipment time will be between 2-5 business days depending on your location.


RETURNS AND EXCHANGES

If there is absolutely anything wrong with your order, please do not hesitate to shoot us an email at support@flashsales.com and we will help you out right away!


CUSTOMER SERVICE

Our helpful customer service department is committed to assist you in every way. If you have a question or problem with your order, please email us at support@flashsales.com 24 hours a day, 7 days a week!


  • 30 DAYS RETURN
  • 12 MONTH WARRANTY
  • BEST PRICE GUARANTEE
  • Free international shipping.
